message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item in the cash flow statement that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life.

Looking at the cash flow statement, this would be the "Depreciation" line item. Depreciation is the accounting method used to allocate the cost of a tangible or physical asset over its useful life.

In the given cash flow statement, I can see the Depreciation line under Cash Flow From Operating Activities with a value of 115511.91.

Therefore, the solution is:

```json
{"solution": {'value': '115511.91'} }
```
